rooms.description: Spacious living room with ample natural light, oriented towards the east for positive Vastu energy.
Modern kitchen designed for efficiency and safety, located adjacent to dining area.
Dining room with large windows facing south as per Vastu guidelines.
Master bedroom overlooking the garden area with additional privacy screens.
Additional bedroom with sufficient space and north-facing window for balanced energy.
Third bedroom designed to meet family requirements and ensure proper privacy.
Fourth bedroom in line with budget considerations yet adhering to space optimization.

openings.description: Main entrance door leading into living room, designed for security and ease of access.
Large window set in east wall ensuring maximum daylight as per Vastu principles.
